column2: "...So, you say you aren't Miko-sama? Bah... How disappointing."
"Were Miko-sama to fight alongside us Shironians, those Kuronites wouldn't stand a chance..."
"Quite a selfish display, was it not?"
"Not just of that one in particular. Shironians in general are much the same. They are wont to say such things without malice."
"Of course, t'was the Kuronites who first violated laws in the most recent invasion. They art flawed, and foolish."
"Whether those uncanny children art manipulating or even deceiving the Kuronites... Either way, 'tis plain as day that they art fools."
"As is the King of Kuron, for his indifference."
"However, 'tis not only the Kuronites. The Shironians art fools as well. Foolish beings, the lot of them."
"Hopelessly blind to even the possibility of peace, they have simply rushed headlong down the path of war... yet again."
"...Ahh, fools... such fools. Mine mother and father doth assuredly weep from beyond the grave."
"Practice not a measure of restraint on this planet. Go with mine blessing and give them a proper thrashing."
"...Do you think... something happened in Sukuna-hime's past?"
